text: Kartik Aaryan is an Indian actor who primarily appears in Hindi films. His career has steadily been on the upward trajectory ever since his debut in a lead role in the romantic comedy Pyaar Ka Punchnama (2011), which film was a major commercial success; and for which he earned a Producers Guild Film Awards nomination for Best Male Debut. He has since been seen in lead roles in successful films such as Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety (2018), Luka Chuppi (2019), Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2 (2022) etc. Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors
title: Kartik Aaryan
